problem.markdown:
>>1. By weight, bone tissue is ___ mineral and ___ organic material.<< (x) 70% and 30% ( ) 30 % and 70% ( ) 60% and 40 % ( ) 50 % and 50 % .
>>2. Humerus is the bone of<< ( ) Lower arm (x) Upper arm ( ) The lateral bone of the forearm ( ) medial bone of the forearm
>>3. Which one is the largest and strongest bone of the skeleton?<< ( ) Ulna (x) Femur ( ) Tibia ( ) patella
>>4. What is the crown in tooth?<< (x) the projected portion beyond the gum ( ) portion between the roots ( ) in the sockets of the maxilla ( ) none of them
>>5. Which one is the bone of facial part?<< (x) Palantine ( ) vomer ( ) Lachrymal ( ) occipital
>>6. Where is vomer situated<< (x) in the lower part of the septum of the nose ( ) in the upper part of the septum of the nose ( ) in the right side of the septum of the nose ( ) near the front part of the medial orbital walls.
>>7. Parietal are ____ in number.<< ( ) 3 ( ) 4 (x) 2 ( ) 1
>>8. What is ethmoid ?<< ( ) The region of the forehead ( ) walls and roof the brainbox ( ) The posterior (x) The anterior part of base of the cranium
>>9. Since when ossification of body Skelton begins?<< ( ) 6th week of foetal life (x) 5th week of foetal life ( ) 10th week of foetal life ( ) 12th week of foetal life
>>10. The skeleton of the foot consists of __ sets of bones<< ( ) 4 (x) 3 ( ) 1 ( ) 2
problem.p: 1. By weight, bone tissue is ___ mineral and ___ organic material.

choicegroup.label: 1. By weight, bone tissue is ___ mineral and ___ organic material.
2. Humerus is the bone of
choicegroup.choice: The lateral bone of the forearm

problem.p: 3. Which one is the largest and strongest bone of the skeleton?

choicegroup.label: 3. Which one is the largest and strongest bone of the skeleton?

problem.p: 4. What is the crown in tooth?

choicegroup.label: 4. What is the crown in tooth?
choicegroup.choice: the projected portion beyond the gum
in the sockets of the maxilla

problem.p: 5. Which one is the bone of facial part?

choicegroup.label: 5. Which one is the bone of facial part?
6. Where is vomer situated
choicegroup.choice: in the lower part of the septum of the nose
in the upper part of the septum of the nose
in the right side of the septum of the nose
near the front part of the medial orbital walls.

choicegroup.label: 8. What is ethmoid ?
choicegroup.choice: The anterior part of base of the cranium

problem.p: 9. Since when ossification of body Skelton begins?

choicegroup.label: 9. Since when ossification of body Skelton begins?

problem.p: 10. The skeleton of the foot consists of __ sets of bones

choicegroup.label: 10. The skeleton of the foot consists of __ sets of bones
